motions.title: Amend Agenda to Move Recognition Item
motions.description: Motion to amend the agenda to move item number 3 (Special Recognition of Bill McCahan) to immediately follow item number 1.

motions.title: 2024 Millage Rate Adoption
motions.description: Approval of resolution establishing the 2024 millage rate of 3.04 mills after third public hearing.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • June 10, 2024 meeting minutes • June 26, 2024 special called meeting minutes • June 27, 2024 special called meeting minutes

motions.title: American Rescue Plan Timeline Extension
motions.description: Approval of timeline extension for American Rescue Plan grants to December 31, 2024.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for real estate and legal discussion.

publicHearings.title: Public Hearing for Establishing 2024 Millage Rate
publicHearings.description: Third and final public hearing for proposed 2024 millage rate of 3.040 mills. Multiple speakers in favor, some opposed requesting increases.

publicHearings.title: Community Residences and Recovery Communities Ordinance (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of ordinance to define Community Residences and Recovery Communities and create use regulations. Public opposition expressed concerns about distance requirements.
publicHearings.action: Continued to next meeting for staff recommendations on distance requirements

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Officer Ramatu Kamara
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch administered oath of office to Officer Ramatu Kamara.

specialEvents.title: Special Recognition of Bill McCahan
specialEvents.description: Certificate of Appreciation presented to Bill McCahan for his service to the city.
specialEvents.presenter: Mayor Deutsch and Council Member Harris
